HDG.BC.content: [beyond philosophy] indefinite title Grundbegriffe: do not commit ourselves to anything in advance [Heidegger opens] > “readiness to put the essence of man at risk in thinking that which grounds this essence,” that which he takes for being [Heidegger closes?]: “whatever grounds everything and gives ground to everything is itself the ground” [causa sui?]

HDG.BC.content: [in atomic age, in atomic physics] what is “unforeseeable (Unvorhersehbare),” can’t be calculated/computed in advance, shows itself as something new, can’t be explained by something else—lacks a cause (atomic physics, w/ its invalidation of law of causality, refutes Kant, all previous philosophy [?]) > what is “uncaused,” [acc. atomic physics]: “spontaneous,” free

HDG.WM.linkedContent: practical goals, technical organization: unites dispersed atrophied sciences [Husserl] > exactness of science vs. rigor of philosophy

HDG.WM.content: going beyond beings occurs in essence of Dasein > this going beyond is metaphysics itself—thus, metaphysics belongs to “nature of the human being” > “because the truth of metaphysics dwells in this abyssal ground [hermeneutic circle of Dasein & metaphysics] it stands in closest proximity to the constantly lurking possibility of deepest error” > [but philosophy was born?] the getting under way of metaphysics, the coming to itself of philosophy, to its explicit tasks

HDG.WM.linkedContent: going beyond beings occurs in essence of Dasein > this going beyond is metaphysics itself—thus, metaphysics belongs to “nature of the human being” > “because the truth of metaphysics dwells in this abyssal ground [hermeneutic circle of Dasein & metaphysics] it stands in closest proximity to the constantly lurking possibility of deepest error” > [but philosophy was born?] the getting under way of metaphysics, the coming to itself of philosophy, to its explicit tasks

HDG.WM.content: for philosophy to get underway: 1) allow space for beings as a whole 2) release ourselves into the nothing, liberate ourselves from idols 3) let sweep of our suspense (Schwebens) take its full course, so it swings back to fundamental question of metaphysics [possibility of “why” makes it possible to ground things > destiny of our existence placed in hands of researcher (Forschers) (Nietzsche)] [destiny, question, ground of metaphysics, beyond metaphysics]

HDG.WM.linkedContent: for philosophy to get underway: 1) allow space for beings as a whole 2) release ourselves into the nothing, liberate ourselves from idols 3) let sweep of our suspense (Schwebens) take its full course, so it swings back to fundamental question of metaphysics [possibility of “why” makes it possible to ground things > destiny of our existence placed in hands of researcher (Forschers) (Nietzsche)] [destiny, question, ground of metaphysics, beyond metaphysics]

HDG.IWM.content: truth of Being called ground, that which nourishes root of tree of philosophy (i.e. metaphysics) > in the ground, roots forget themselves for sake of tree > philosophy doesn’t gather itself upon its ground, always leaves (never escapes) its ground, by means of metaphysics

HDG.IWM.linkedContent: truth of Being called ground, that which nourishes root of tree of philosophy (i.e. metaphysics) > in the ground, roots forget themselves for sake of tree > philosophy doesn’t gather itself upon its ground, always leaves (never escapes) its ground, by means of metaphysics

HDG.IWM.content: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being

HDG.IWM.linkedContent: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being

HDG.QB.content: people have tended to represent “oblivion of being” as if Being were an umbrella forgotten by some philosophy professor [Nietzsche, cf. S] > oblivion, concealing of as yet unrevealed essence (Wesen) (verbal—essential unfolding) of X Being, shelters (birgt) untapped treasures, promise (Versprechen) of a find that awaits appropriate seeking (das gemässe Suchen wartet) > to have premonition (vermuten) of this doesn’t require prophetic gifts but only attentiveness (Achtung), practiced for decades, to that announced (bekundet) in metaphysical thinking [Heidegger’s askesis]

S] > oblivion, concealing of as yet unrevealed essence (Wesen) (verbal—essential unfolding) of X Being, shelters (birgt) untapped treasures, promise (Versprechen) of a find that awaits appropriate seeking (das gemässe Suchen wartet) > to have premonition (vermuten) of this doesn’t require prophetic gifts but only attentiveness (Achtung), practiced for decades, to that announced (bekundet) in metaphysical thinking [Heidegger’s askesis]

HDG.FS.content: destiny of being (Geschick des Seins), will we be able to think it on its own terms [arrival]?: the task of thinking (Aufgabe des Denkens), which poetry is “heilsame Gefahr (wholesome danger)”: poetry has been faithful to site (Stätte) of inceptual upsurge (ursprünglichen Auf-gehens) [philosophy less faithful?]

HDG.FS.content: if “scission (Ent-zweiung)” is source (Quell) of need for philosophy, if philosophy arises as soon as it is torn, “what is the driving force (treibende Kraft) of the dichotomy (Entzweiung)? > if tearing is necessary, can one speak of unity before tearing?

HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger recognizes an accusation that he derived “being” from “is,” developed his philosophy form this “abstraction” > no, can only say “is” in openness of Being

HDG.FS.content: God as Summum Ens, actus purus essendi—how does Aristotle’s energeia become actualitas? > Romans understood ergon, energeia, on basis of AGERE, “to make,” in an ontic sense, so Summum ens becomes CREATOR, ENS CREATUM (INCREATUM) > ontic determination of actualitas together w/ Aquinas’ Summum Ens w/ Ipsum esse, ontology suppresses possibility for question of Being > to restore (weider einsetzen) philosophy to its own essence: purge (entlasten) it of its Christian element

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.FS.linkedContent: dimension of entirely excessive [totally other?] is that in which philosophy arises (entspringt), philosophy as answer (Antwort) of a humanity struck (betroffenen) by excess of presence, philosophy as a hyper-Greek way of ek-sisting

HDG.FS.content: [machine & event?] can a thinker ever reconcile these 2 “realms” that have grown foreign to one another: “technologically dominable nature of science” and “natural nature of the…dwelling of man” [reflections on Gelassenheit, comportment (Haltung) of “self-joining (Sicheinfügens),” cautious sheltering, opening to secret (Geheimnis)]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.FS.linkedContent: [machine & event?] can a thinker ever reconcile these 2 “realms” that have grown foreign to one another: “technologically dominable nature of science” and “natural nature of the…dwelling of man” [reflections on Gelassenheit, comportment (Haltung) of “self-joining (Sicheinfügens),” cautious sheltering, opening to secret (Geheimnis)]

HDG.FS.content: unified question: being as position (Setzung) converges w/ totality of self-evident presuppositions & this convergence nourishes modern technological thinking > this unity evident in Kant’s title Metaphysical Foundations of Natural Science

HDG.FS.linkedContent: unified question: being as position (Setzung) converges w/ totality of self-evident presuppositions & this convergence nourishes modern technological thinking > this unity evident in Kant’s title Metaphysical Foundations of Natural Science

HDG.FS.content: being is not a being: the ontological difference > difference not produced by metaphysics, it maintains/subtends metaphysics > said in Kantian manner, ontological difference is condition of possibility for ontology > ontological difference reigns in all philosophy, fundamentally concealed, never thematized [Derrida’s described not declared]

HDG.FS.linkedContent: being is not a being: the ontological difference > difference not produced by metaphysics, it maintains/subtends metaphysics > said in Kantian manner, ontological difference is condition of possibility for ontology > ontological difference reigns in all philosophy, fundamentally concealed, never thematized [Derrida’s described not declared]

HDG.FS.content: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger somewhat aligns himself w/ Marx, though he insists via question that every interpretation [of genuine thinking] can/must lead to transformation (Veränderung) of world > Heidegger also insists that praxis in Marx is determined by a theory of production as production of human itself (founded in Hegelian philosophy) > theory/praxis: sisters born from unknown parents [baby daddy]

HDG.FS.content: twofold seeing: two visions: sensuous vision & categorial vision > difficulty in double signification of seeing (one that already governs Plato’s philosophy)

HDG.FS.linkedContent: twofold seeing: two visions: sensuous vision & categorial vision > difficulty in double signification of seeing (one that already governs Plato’s philosophy)

HDG.FS.content: the thinking here [Greek thought]: tautological thinking: primordial sense of phenomenology, prior to any distinction btwn theory/praxis > in philosophy there are only paths (Wege), in sciences only methods > to understand phenomenology: path that leads away to come before…, “lets that before which it is led show itself”: a phenomenology of the inapparent > now you can understand: there were no concepts for Greeks

HDG.MA.content: possible that technology in atomic age could captivate/bewitch/dazzle/beguile so that calculative thinking accepted/practiced as the only way of thinking [end of philosophy] > keep meditative thinking: persistent courageous thinking allows Gelassenheit, openness to Geheimnis, to flourish

HDG.WL.content: attempting a way to language by speaking testifies (bezeugt) that language has woven us into speaking [why?] > this web (Geflecht) is the predetermined realm (vorbestimmten Bereich) that any reflection on language (linguistic theory, philosophy of language, etc.) must live (aufhalten) [factical life of language]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.WL.linkedContent: attempting a way to language by speaking testifies (bezeugt) that language has woven us into speaking [why?] > this web (Geflecht) is the predetermined realm (vorbestimmten Bereich) that any reflection on language (linguistic theory, philosophy of language, etc.) must live (aufhalten) [factical life of language]

HDG.WL.content: [re: Ge-stell (Framing)] speaking challenged to correspond totally to Ge-stell, in which all present beings (Anwesenden) can be commandeered, speaking turns to information > informs itself about itself to safeguard its procedures > formalization (calculated availability [rechnerische Bestellbarkeit] of Saying) is goal/norm > even to say that nature of language can’t become part of formalism’s calculations, “natural language” being described negatively

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.WL.linkedContent: [re: Ge-stell (Framing)] speaking challenged to correspond totally to Ge-stell, in which all present beings (Anwesenden) can be commandeered, speaking turns to information > informs itself about itself to safeguard its procedures > formalization (calculated availability [rechnerische Bestellbarkeit] of Saying) is goal/norm > even to say that nature of language can’t become part of formalism’s calculations, “natural language” being described negatively

HDG.WL.content: Saying has already overtaken (überholt) destructiveness of information-language because Appropriation can’t be commandeered (Unbestellbaren des Ereignisses)? > all true language (eigentliche Sprache), because sent/assigned/destined (geschickt) by way-making of Saying, is in the nature of destiny (dadurch geschicklich) > no natural language of human w/out destiny, all language is historical > information-language too is historical, in sense of limits of present era > this era begins nothing new, only carries the old aspects of modern age to the extreme

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.WL.linkedContent: Saying has already overtaken (überholt) destructiveness of information-language because Appropriation can’t be commandeered (Unbestellbaren des Ereignisses)? > all true language (eigentliche Sprache), because sent/assigned/destined (geschickt) by way-making of Saying, is in the nature of destiny (dadurch geschicklich) > no natural language of human w/out destiny, all language is historical > information-language too is historical, in sense of limits of present era > this era begins nothing new, only carries the old aspects of modern age to the extreme

HDG.EC.content: [Chinese philosophy] “human needs only enough space to be able to put his foot down” > but what use would be that standing if a crevice opened up to the underworld around it? [shortest shadow] > no more use > from this, necessity of unnecessary clearly apparent

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [on demands for and against types of presuppositions: cries of anxiety in face of philosophy]

HDG.OHF.content: all talking about hermeneutics misunderstands it, the wakefulness for facticity must temporalize/unfold “there” > hermeneutics [Heidegger admits to making a personal statement] not philosophy at all, something preliminary (Vorläufiges), has its own explanation (Bewandtnis) for being: what’s at issue in it, not to be finished quickly, rather to hold out in it as long as possible (möglichste lange darin auszuhalten) [slow down] > we’ve become so weak-kneed, pithless, can’t hold out in asking a qustion

HDG.OHF.content: [method, don’t refute but hermeneut philosophy of today]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method, don’t refute but hermeneut philosophy of today]

HDG.OHF.content: phenomenology can only be appropriated (zugeeignet) phenomenologically, i.e. through demonstration (Ausweisung), & not by repeating Grundsätze or following Schuldogmen > we’re constantly deceived about things in themselves: once the conscience of philosophy, “now a pimp (Zuhälterin) for the public whoring of the mind (öffentlichen Hurerei des Geistes), fornicatio spiritus” (Luther)

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: phenomenology can only be appropriated (zugeeignet) phenomenologically, i.e. through demonstration (Ausweisung), & not by repeating Grundsätze or following Schuldogmen > we’re constantly deceived about things in themselves: once the conscience of philosophy, “now a pimp (Zuhälterin) for the public whoring of the mind (öffentlichen Hurerei des Geistes), fornicatio spiritus” (Luther)

HDG.OHF.content: [method warning re: phenomenology] not about obtaining/delivering propositions/dogmas re: Dasein, generating a philosophy around it > rather, a special investigation w/ view to right direction of looking toward genuine phenomenon

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method warning re: phenomenology] not about obtaining/delivering propositions/dogmas re: Dasein, generating a philosophy around it > rather, a special investigation w/ view to right direction of looking toward genuine phenomenon

HDG.OHF.content: two modes of Dasein of today (Dasein im Heute) (discourse about Dasein) [initial givens of today, closest to us? (Zunächst des Heute)] (: 1) historical consciousness 2) philosophy > modes of interpreting, modes of Dasein’s having-itself in a definite manner, must interrogate these modes to interrogate Dasein of today, to subject the today to a destruction > genuine question of hermeneutics: what Seinscharakter of Dasein shows up (zeigt sich) [cf. Sage as showing] in these modes of having-itself (Sichselbstshabens)?

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: two modes of Dasein of today (Dasein im Heute) (discourse about Dasein) [initial givens of today, closest to us? (Zunächst des Heute)] (: 1) historical consciousness 2) philosophy > modes of interpreting, modes of Dasein’s having-itself in a definite manner, must interrogate these modes to interrogate Dasein of today, to subject the today to a destruction > genuine question of hermeneutics: what Seinscharakter of Dasein shows up (zeigt sich) [cf. Sage as showing] in these modes of having-itself (Sichselbstshabens)?

HDG.OHF.content: [method] [from] as what is factical Dasein being encountered in historical consciousness & philosophy? [to] what does factical Dasein have itself in these interpretations? [to] what is the having-itself-there of Da-sein as being, as a How of facticity, as an existential?

HDG.OHF.content: [method] to discover the as what encountered via todayness of historical consciousness & philosophy, we follow a path of analysis “in which we look to their particular modes of being-related (Weise des Bezogenseins) to their object”

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method] to discover the as what encountered via todayness of historical consciousness & philosophy, we follow a path of analysis “in which we look to their particular modes of being-related (Weise des Bezogenseins) to their object”

HDG.OHF.content: attention (aufmerksam) should’ve been called to certain difficulty: many directions of philosophy today don’t provide much basis for phenomenological analysis Heidegger is initiating here

motif.title: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION (UNIVERSITY, POPULAR) via KANT

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: attention (aufmerksam) should’ve been called to certain difficulty: many directions of philosophy today don’t provide much basis for phenomenological analysis Heidegger is initiating here

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis

motif.name: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION  (UNIVERSITY) CIPH, GREPH

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis

HDG.OHF.content: philosophy as universal classification (Ordnen), encompasses (umspannt) totality of culture (Gesamtheit der Kultur), the system of cultural systems > this totality not examined as theme in philosophy > temporal itself not investigated, but rather is that from out of which (von dem aus) classifying takes its point of departure (das Ordnen seinen Ausgang nimmt), so to insert it into context of classification > the comporting at point of departure (Ausgangsverhalten) of classifying grasps temporal in advance as types, essential generalities, only in this way can it enter a context of classification, so it doesn’t define or tarry in transitional stage, the one relevant for its actualizing > no one is disturbed by this, they characterize the point of departure as an object (temporal, empirical, mutable, subjective, real, singular, individual), in contrast to trans-temporal, ideal, universal

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: philosophy as universal classification (Ordnen), encompasses (umspannt) totality of culture (Gesamtheit der Kultur), the system of cultural systems > this totality not examined as theme in philosophy > temporal itself not investigated, but rather is that from out of which (von dem aus) classifying takes its point of departure (das Ordnen seinen Ausgang nimmt), so to insert it into context of classification > the comporting at point of departure (Ausgangsverhalten) of classifying grasps temporal in advance as types, essential generalities, only in this way can it enter a context of classification, so it doesn’t define or tarry in transitional stage, the one relevant for its actualizing > no one is disturbed by this, they characterize the point of departure as an object (temporal, empirical, mutable, subjective, real, singular, individual), in contrast to trans-temporal, ideal, universal

HDG.OHF.content: developing (Ausbilden) of context of classificatory order is the leading self-conditioning mode of philosophy [the other 2: 1) the Ausgangsverhalten 2) accommodating multiplicity of types], analogous to holding-in-view of style in historical consciousness > this leading mode not a mere depicting, but a creative developing (schöpferisches Ausbilden) of the order itself: fashions (bildet) for/out of itself possibility of a universal process

motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: developing (Ausbilden) of context of classificatory order is the leading self-conditioning mode of philosophy [the other 2: 1) the Ausgangsverhalten 2) accommodating multiplicity of types], analogous to holding-in-view of style in historical consciousness > this leading mode not a mere depicting, but a creative developing (schöpferisches Ausbilden) of the order itself: fashions (bildet) for/out of itself possibility of a universal process

HDG.OHF.content: being everywhere & nowhere of philosophical knowing: an absolute curiosity (Neugier) [Heidegger then describes something close to idle talk, how philosophy is public, has an autonomous curiosity, gives itself a foothold in life, thus preserving itself]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: being everywhere & nowhere of philosophical knowing: an absolute curiosity (Neugier) [Heidegger then describes something close to idle talk, how philosophy is public, has an autonomous curiosity, gives itself a foothold in life, thus preserving itself]

HDG.OHF.content: objective scientific type of philosophy: proper refuge (Schutzwehr) in which Dasein protected from abysmal (bodenlosen) relativism, finds a secure foothold, brings objective possibility of more objective agreement (Übereinstimmung), “All of us…”, i.e. presents Dasein w/ tranquil certainty/security (ruhige Sicherheit) of general/unanimous “yes, I agree” [a force against snarl of worldviews, & rampant skepticism of our day] > when the system is dynamic has character of life itself, simultaneously universal & concrete [not subjective]

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: objective scientific type of philosophy: proper refuge (Schutzwehr) in which Dasein protected from abysmal (bodenlosen) relativism, finds a secure foothold, brings objective possibility of more objective agreement (Übereinstimmung), “All of us…”, i.e. presents Dasein w/ tranquil certainty/security (ruhige Sicherheit) of general/unanimous “yes, I agree” [a force against snarl of worldviews, & rampant skepticism of our day] > when the system is dynamic has character of life itself, simultaneously universal & concrete [not subjective]

HDG.OHF.content: [Hegel as objective scientific philosophy] “Spirit” now lives in abode (Ort) of its self-certainty, no more goals, feelings, interests: “life has retired (zurückgezogen) into its authentic freedom”

motif.name: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION  (UNIVERSITY) CIPH, GREPH

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [Hegel as objective scientific philosophy] “Spirit” now lives in abode (Ort) of its self-certainty, no more goals, feelings, interests: “life has retired (zurückgezogen) into its authentic freedom”

HDG.OHF.content: [method: Heidegger now tries to show what is there for Dasein in the 2 interpretative modes (philosophy, historical consciousness)] Dasein itself goes toward something, having itself objectively there for itself, bringing itself objectively into its there > historical consciousness & philosophy are modes of Dasein, paths held open (preserved in itself), paths of securing/making certain, paths of falling away > Dasein encounters itself free of standpoints in objective certainty: 1) historical consciousness, Dasein encounters wealth of objective being of its having-been (Gewesenseins) 2) philosophy, Dasein encounters immutability of its always-being-in-such-a-manner (Immersoseins) > both interpretations bring Dasein before its highest & pure present

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.OHF.content: [history of human sciences & philosophy orienting themselves in 19th century toward demarcation (Abgrenzung) of natural sciences, following Kant?]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [history of human sciences & philosophy orienting themselves in 19th century toward demarcation (Abgrenzung) of natural sciences, following Kant?]

HDG.OHF.content: [method] to hit upon object in primordial manner: 1) provide/sketch in advance character of being of object of philosophy 2) provide/sketch character of way it becomes object for us 3) right way to gain access to it & bring it to true safekeeping

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method] to hit upon object in primordial manner: 1) provide/sketch in advance character of being of object of philosophy 2) provide/sketch character of way it becomes object for us 3) right way to gain access to it & bring it to true safekeeping

HDG.OHF.content: “phenomenon” will become truly earnest matter if it turns that to be in mode of covering-up-itself (Sich-verdeckens) & self-veiling (Sich-verschleierns) [which constitutes object of philosophy] belongs to Seinscharakter des Seins [withdrawal of Being]: phenomenology in radical sense

HDG.OHF.content: der Einsatz (initial engagement & bringing into play), “as what” facticity is grasped/stirred in advance, arises out of fundamental experience, out of truth of primordial self-interpretation of philosophy
